query: SELECT c.nameEn as category, COUNT(p.id) as count FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id GROUP BY c.nameEn ORDER BY c.nameEn;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user gjuqDE6BkXEJ8aC.fbd2a1734466 --database VA6tZfdqK6JEcwJnq8qJwL --execute SELECT c.nameEn as category, COUNT(p.id) as count FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.categoryId = c.id GROUP BY c.nameEn ORDER BY c.nameEn;
